page.title: 03MILLBUIE FARM
page.content: {Millbuie farm}is leased by Mr Scott from Dunecht estate.The land total is 160 acres and used mainly for{beef {cattle.}Mr Scott keeps approximately 120 cows,some Fresian,Limousine and cross_breeds. Millbuie was a dairy farm until 1980 but the cattle are kept only to be fattened for selling. The cows are fed on{barley}which is grown on the farm.Potato crops were grown for two years but without much success. During busy times of the year,spring and autumn Mr Scott starts work at seven and often works through till ten at night. Mr Scott has two farm hands,one stays in the farm cottage.He owns three tractors,one combine harvester and a hay baler.He does not attend auctions, dealers send him{cows from Somerset.
